Utilities

Interface IStatistics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Statistics

    public interface IStatistics
    This injectable interface represents a Statistics Utility to be used for statistical calculations and management.

      This method filters the active/frozen/closed requests during the selected sub-period, keeps only the requests for which the status' end date is set later than, or on the same day, of picked end date.

      • filterStatusByDateRange

        java.lang.Integer filterStatusByDateRange(java.time.LocalDate pickedStartDate,
                                          java.time.LocalDate pickedEndDate,
                                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.time.LocalDate> startDates,
                                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.time.LocalDate> endDates)
        This method filters the active/frozen/closed requests during the selected sub-period, keeps only the requests for which the status' end date is set later than, or on the same day, of picked end date.
        Parameters:
        pickedStartDate - Start Date of Report Issued
        pickedEndDate - End Date of Report Issued
        startDates - Request ID, Status Start Date Start Dates of active/frozen/closed request statuses
        endDates - Request ID, Status End Date End Dates of active/frozen/closed request statuses
        Returns:
        Amount of Requests after Filtering

      • filterActiveDaysByDateRange

        java.lang.Integer filterActiveDaysByDateRange(java.time.LocalDate pickedStartDate,
                                              java.time.LocalDate pickedEndDate,
                                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.time.LocalDate> startDates,
                                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.time.LocalDate> endDates)
        This method filters the active requests during the selected sub-period, keeps the requests and retrieves the work days (active days) out of them.
        Parameters:
        pickedStartDate - Start Date of Report Issued
        pickedEndDate - End Date of Report Issued
        startDates - Request ID, Status Start Date Start Dates of active requests
        endDates - Request ID, Status End Date End Dates of active requests
        Returns:
        Amount of Requests after Filtering
